FORM_1:
**In which channel will goodbye messages be sent?**

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by mentioning a channel!*
FORM_3:
**Do you want a great goodbye image too?**

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by sending `yes` or `no`!*
FORM_SUCCESS:
**Alright, done!**

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by sending `{{prefix}}goodbye test` to preview your custom goodbye message!*
MAX_CHARACT: A tua mensagem não deve exceder 1800 carateres!
DISABLED:
**Goodbye messages have just been disabled!**

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by sending `{{prefix}}configuration` to see the updated server configuration!*
TITLE: ADEUS
